[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”2 Days workshop on Google Ads.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1594453697343{margin-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”title-heading nexa-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”Google AD-Words (SEM)” font_container=”tag:h5|font_size:16px|text_align:left|color:__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Topics will be Covered:
• Introduction to Google Ads
• SEO vs Google Ads
• Introduction to Keyword Tool Planner
• Finding Relevant Keyword using Tool Planner
• Bidding Process & Budgeting
• Ad Extensions
• Search Ads
• Display Campaigns
• Ad Placements
• Analytics & Reports
• Assignments
• Live Case Studies
• Some Tips and Tricks for Ads

Read more


Support:
• 5 days of email support available to answer the queries.
• Consultancy Services available (charged separately).
• The course will be interactive with the Q&A slot included.

Payment Terms:
• Advance Payment. Payment done will not be refunded.
• In case you miss the lecture, it will be rescheduled as per the next available slot.

Read less

Amount : Rs 8000.
Discounted Amount : Rs 3000 – For the first few registrations
Duration : 8 Hours (4 Hrs + 4 Hrs)

[vc_column_text]
